Mini 1227: Small Town Scumbags

Hometown football games. Playing with the kids in the front yard, not worrying about the threats that city life brings. Common sense and wholesome hospitality are the law of the land. There's not much to do here in GST (Generic Small Town), but life here is both quaint and peaceful. Perfectly isolated from the troubles of the world outside the city limits, the few citizens of GST never bothered to think of what would happen if tragedy struck.

Until now.

~~

General Rules:

I, Papa Zito, am your moderator for this game. What I say goes.

You may not communicate with anyone in this game outside of the thread, unless your role permits you to do so.

You may not quote any communication that you have with me.

If you need my attention during the game, feel free to post in in the thread or shoot me a PM

If you notify me in the thread, it would be appreciated if you would bold your request so that it is easy to see.

This is a game. The purpose is to have fun. Personal attacks are expressly forbidden. You get one warning. After that, you will be replaced from the game.

You may not discuss ongoing games.

The color green is reserved for the mod. Please do not use it.

Gameplay Rules:

In order for your vote to be counted it must be bolded and in the form VOTE: ConfidAnon

You are not required to unvote before you revote, but it is recommended for ease of creating vote counts.

You may vote for No Lynch if you so desire. Format it like this: VOTE: No Lynch

Majority is required for a lynch to occur. No majority at deadline results in a No Lynch.

Once a majority is reached, the decision is final, and the person voted out will be lynched. Their role will be revealed, and they will be considered dead.

When you die, you are no longer allowed to post in the thread. Not even a "Bah!" post.

Activity Rules:

Inactivity kills games. Try to be active.

Please notify me of all instances of V/LA. I do not regularly check the V/LA thread, so to avoid prods post your V/LA's in your signature or the thread.

Prods will be sent after 72 hours without a post.

Once a prod is sent, you have 24 hours to respond. If you do not respond within 24 hours, you will be replaced.

If you receive a third prod, you will be replaced.

Deadlines are set at #players + 3. For example, for Day 1, there will be 13 players, so the deadline will be set for 16 days.

Deadline extensions may be requested, however I will only grant them if there is an issue with finding a replacement.

Setup

This game will utilize a closed setup which adheres to the sitewide Normal Game guidelines. The setup has been certified for normality and balance by the Normal Review group. This game was originally to be modded by ConfidAnon, who has flaked the queue, and so will instead be run by Papa Zito. No changes to the approved setup have been made.

At least one person will receive the following role PM:
Welcome to Mini 1227: Small Town Scumbags!

You are a Vanilla Townie! While you have no ability to influence the game during the Night Phase, you may use your vote, logic, and intuition during the Day Phase to try to eliminate the Mafia who have invaded GST.

You win when all threats to the Town's existence are eliminated.

Please confirm by PM by sending the name of your role only (don't quote and send). The game thread is here, and will be opened when ten players have confirmed.

Good luck.

Wikipedia
The Free Encyclopedia

Generic Small Town, USA
Generic Small Town (GST) is a town in Generic State, USA. As of the 2000 U.S. Census, the city population was 18. The town gained some fame with the discovery of a fossilzed mammoth named Woobly. There is now a restaurant/museum of the same name to honor this discovery.

Geography

Generic Small Town is located at 29°1′34″N 95°23′40″W (29.026060, -95.394539). According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of 1,000 square yards (914.4 sq m), of which, 950 square yards (868.68 sq m) of it is land and 50 square yards (45.72 sq m) of it (5.0%) is water.

History
This small group of people has lived here since time immemorial, waiting for... something.

Also mammoth.

Demographics
Generic Small Town consists of 18 people, all of which (100%) are human.

Education
The public schools in the town are widely considered the best in a 1000 square yard area.

Culture
MAMMOTH.

The ground shook as the last three struggled to find the final killer. Dust and debris fell from Town Hall Cave, threatening to smother the meager fire. Outside, arcs of Chaos touched and withdrew from the sky, leaving small cracks of void behind. A cold wind howled as it destroyed the small buildings that once made up Small Generic Town.

Two figures sat before a board, one in white and one in red. The one in white touched one of the last remaining pieces, which crumbled into obsidian ash. With that, both players sat back and watched as the board finally stood still.

"It is done, " said the one in white. "As I told you it would be. Even limited, I know my own creation. My will be done."

The one in red studied the board for a short time more, before finally raising his hands as if in surrender. "As you say. But of course, the game is not over yet."
